about_the_game:
WARNING:
This content is currently available for FREE. You can purchase the DLC to keep lifetime access to these units. Future audits may complete it with new content as well. If you cannot afford a subscription you can still support the project with a DLC. THANK YOU!

This DLC grants you lifetime access to the following Tier 0 (pre-1940) light tanks:
  • GERMAN Panzer II C
    • Main gun: 2cm Kw.K. 30 L / 55
    • Coax MG: 7.92mm MG34
  • BRITISH Vickers VIb
    • Main gun: Vickers .50 machine gun
    • Coax MG: Vickers .303 cal machine gun
  • FRENCH R-35
    • Main gun: canon de 37mm S.A. mle 1918 M37
    • Coax MG: mitrailleuse de 7.5mm mle 1931
Upon purchase, these vehicles will be immediately available for you to access, providing supply is available at the spawn you have selected.

Controls

Default control keys:


  • Infantries can sit on your tank when you are not moving: they must press the "j" key while standing next to you.
  • You can board a Cargo ship: press "h" when the hook is lowered near your hatch.
  • All vehicles in WWII Online can be multi-crewed by two players. Even if your friend doesn't own this pack he can still control the vehicle with you

These controls can be customized through the ingame keymapper. If you don't have a joystick: just configure the controls with your keyboard and mouse.
detailed_description:
WARNING:
This content is currently available for FREE. You can purchase the DLC to keep lifetime access to these units. Future audits may complete it with new content as well. If you cannot afford a subscription you can still support the project with a DLC. THANK YOU!

This DLC grants you lifetime access to the following Tier 0 (pre-1940) light tanks:
  • GERMAN Panzer II C
    • Main gun: 2cm Kw.K. 30 L / 55
    • Coax MG: 7.92mm MG34
  • BRITISH Vickers VIb
    • Main gun: Vickers .50 machine gun
    • Coax MG: Vickers .303 cal machine gun
  • FRENCH R-35
    • Main gun: canon de 37mm S.A. mle 1918 M37
    • Coax MG: mitrailleuse de 7.5mm mle 1931
Upon purchase, these vehicles will be immediately available for you to access, providing supply is available at the spawn you have selected.

Controls

Default control keys:


  • Infantries can sit on your tank when you are not moving: they must press the "j" key while standing next to you.
  • You can board a Cargo ship: press "h" when the hook is lowered near your hatch.
  • All vehicles in WWII Online can be multi-crewed by two players. Even if your friend doesn't own this pack he can still control the vehicle with you

These controls can be customized through the ingame keymapper. If you don't have a joystick: just configure the controls with your keyboard and mouse.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.10 +
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8600 series or ATI Radeon HD 2600 Pro
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: on-board or better
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS Sierra 10.12.2+
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 250 or Radeon HD 4850 or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

name: Light Armor Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 / Windows 8
  • Processor: Pentium 4 3.2 GHz or Athlon 64 3500+ (2.2 GHz) or better with SSE 2.0 support
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8600 series or ATI Radeon HD 2600 Pro
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: on-board or better
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 / Windows 8
  • Processor: 3 GHz Dual Core or 2.66 GHz Quad Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 250 or Radeon HD 4850 or better
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: on-board or better

short_description: Join the Tank units of WWII Online and support infantry in your armored vehicle. Their machine guns are devastating and all tanks can be multi-crewed. Are you ready to advance the frontline? Enlist in the armored brigade now!
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
